Write a book about a character who discovers they have a superpower that changes their life forever.
Write a book that explores the themes of love, loss, and the human condition through the eyes of a protagonist who experiences a major life-changing event.
Write a book that follows a group of friends as they embark on a journey to find a legendary treasure.
Write a book that explores the psychological effects of social media on individuals and society as a whole.
Write a book that tells the story of a person who must navigate a new life after a life-altering accident.
